PRICING FAQ

Is there a free plan available?

Yes! Startopia offers a free plan where we discuss your startupâ€™s needs and
recommend the best strategy.

What services are included in the paid plans?

Our Growth and Scale plans include branding, SEO, lead generation, sales
optimization, social media marketing, and automation services.

Do you offer custom startup solutions?

Yes! We tailor our services based on your startup's needs. Contact us for a
custom plan.

How does Startopia help with lead generation?

We use data-driven strategies, cold outreach, LinkedIn campaigns, and SEO
optimization to help you generate high-quality leads.

Can I upgrade my plan later?

Absolutely! You can start with a basic plan and upgrade as your startup grows.

Do you provide SEO services for startups?

Yes! Our SEO services include on-page, off-page, and technical SEO to improve
your website ranking and visibility.

Does Startopia offer marketing services?

Yes! We provide digital and offline marketing, including social media
management, paid advertising, and college-level promotions.

How does AI automation help startups?

We implement AI chatbots and CRM automation to enhance customer engagement and
streamline lead nurturing.

What kind of customer support do you offer?

We offer email and chat support during business hours. For urgent queries, you
can use our automated support system or check our FAQs.

Mar 10, 2024


HOW WE BUILT A BEAUTIFUL 41KB SAAS WEBSITE WITH THIS TEMPLATE

How to use this template you to bootstrap your own site.

We've written a detailed blog post about how we took this template, and created
a real SaaS company website. Topics include:

 * Optimizing the stack for performance and developer productivity
 * Creating rich interactive animations with Svelte
 * Creating pixel perfect designs without rasterization
 * Speed measurements: how we kept it small and lightning fast

Read the Blog Post

The blog post is over on criticalmoments.io, a page which uses this boilerplate
as a starting point.

If you are looking for examples of blog posts with rich content rendered inside
this template, checkout the other demo posts here.
